data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Qingyuan, Guangdong, China to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qingyuan, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Qingyuan, Guangdong, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Qingyuan access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 91,041 believers in Qingyuan, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Zaomin people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Zaomin people.
Jesus, defend your people in the county of Qingyuan against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Qingyuan, Guangdong, China be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the county of Qingyuan, Guangdong, China has a population of 1,200,100.

We estimate Qingyuan has 91,041 people who might know Jesus, 19,387 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,089,672 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Qingyuan.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
